Realtek High Definition Audio Driver is the official release from Realtek, bringing together the driver files needed to activate the audio hardware on your computer. Keeping this driver up-to-date means enjoying the maximum capabilities of the integrated hardware.

However, you may need to consult the motherboardÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s instructions for the original software on your audio product, as that may include further customization settings than the standard one presented here. The installation procedure is simple, but a system restart may be required to make the hardware work properly.
Realtek High Definition Audio Driver features and benefits:
